text: Agelimu ni tamiaan kungsifama, maha Afrikan politik iniika Agelimu ni tamiaan kungsifama Misha Misha, unamem maha breof To free the theopians out of hunger There was no hygiene in our politics

segments.text: Agelimu ni tamiaan kungsifama, maha Afrikan politik iniika
To free the theopians out of hunger
There was no hygiene in our politics
